alert.note: Alert for McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 12:21AM CDT until June 12 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR EASTERN MCLENNAN COUNTY... At 1221 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lacy-Lakeview, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waco, Hewitt, Robinson, Bellmead, Woodway, Lacy-Lakeview, Mart, Beverly Hills, Riesel, Golinda, Hallsburg, Tradinghouse Creek Reservoir, Northcrest, Lake Creek Lake, Lake Waco, Gholson, Leroy, Ross, Elm Mott and Tours. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
